<https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/544764/EB39B07D0744F8D5D1C5EBC4205F8D57/nuggets-41.png> 	

SOL3MATES LAUNCHES SIROCCO 1 SNEAKER

SOL3MATES launches its first physical sneaker, SIROCCO 1, designed by KACIMI Latamène. 

The SIROCCO 1 is now available at Level Shoes, online on SOL3MATES' website and across select retail partners worldwide.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/550481/CE25BE7E34CF05EE1D163D680B1FE4E7/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-64.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/544536/874CDB8153DC9F2C9B83E6F34C73B87E/nuggets-22.png> 	

LAST DAY REMINDER

Don't miss out on 30-50% off from Adolfo Dominguez! 

Visit our Dubai Hills or Mall of the Emirates locations to shop the clearance selection before it ends.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/550476/4C2ED083223A249F6F7CF9E84521DB4A/sale-assets-october.jpg> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/545255/30138DF3EDA646FD48F2FED62CD14D01/nuggets-24.png> 	

SKINCARE CONSULTATIONS IN OUR OFFICES

Last month, our Skincare Squad members conducted consultations in our offices, delivering exceptional experiences for our team members.

Together, our Skincare Squad, Brand Trainers, Marketing and Commercial teams introduced our brands through 90 personal consultations. Stay tuned for more events and opportunities soon!

chunks.text:
Last month, our Skincare Squad members conducted consultations in our offices, delivering exceptional experiences for our team members.

Together, our Skincare Squad, Brand Trainers, Marketing and Commercial teams introduced our brands through 90 personal consultations. Stay tuned for more events and opportunities soon!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/550480/18EBDBF05C2D252D4DBDA953CBD5BB8C/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-63.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/545337/2990EA7837DDFC540556DBE0300C0B64/nuggets-48.png> 	

GIFT OF GIVING INITIATIVE IN JEDDAH

The Gift of Giving initiative, in collaboration with Al Oula NGO, brought together dedicated volunteers from our Jeddah office to distribute school bags to children in need.

Together, we distributed 300 school bags and 6 interactive board screens. Let’s continue to make an impact together!

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/550479/2850AB2386825F1763D1B80F66F8FEE9/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-62.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/545550/8F4FA89C31842253EA9CB68FA8AAF60A/nuggets-58.png> 	

GLIMMERS OF STRENGTH WORKSHOP IN JEDDAH

GLIMMERS OF STRENGTH WORKSHOP IN JEDDAH

Our team members in Jeddah joined breast cancer warriors in a special mirror-designing session at the Glimmers of Strength workshop. Each mirror became a symbol of resilience and hope, reflecting the courage of those battling breast cancer and fostering a deep sense of unity and empowerment.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/oOLSaYvsjUWqECnPqQ86cw/550478/FF2B0D62CEA2999B9F572D6B73038814/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-61.gif>
